pepc-e/face.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !
00002 !   FACE
00003 !
00004 !  Function to set up bounded geometry targets in conjunction with 
00005 !  randion. 
00006 !  M. Hammes, U. Wuppertal
00007 !
00008 !  $Revision$
00009 !
00010 ! Generalised description of convex faces described 
00011 ! by a function f(x, y, z) = 0. 
00012 ! Saves f(r) in c_status
00013 ! and means c_status > 0.: particle is out,
00014 ! c_status < 0.: particle is in.
00015 !
00016 subroutine face(r, c_status, face_nr)
00017     use physvars
00018 
00019 
00020     implicit none 
00021 
00022     real, dimension(1:3)            :: r, r_diff
00023     real                            :: c_status
00024     integer                         :: face_nr
00025 
00026     ! vectors and other values for the slab
00027     real, dimension(1:3)            :: normal_vector, offset_vector
00028     real                            :: gamma
00029 
00030     ! matrix for the ellipsoid
00031     real, dimension(1:3, 1:3)       :: A
00032 
00033     select case (target_geometry)
00034     case (0) ! slab
00035         select case (face_nr)
00036         case(1) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00037             normal_vector = (/0., 0., +1./)
00038             offset_vector = (/0., 0., -z_plasma / 2./) + plasma_centre
00039         case(2) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00040             normal_vector = (/0., 0., -1./)
00041             offset_vector = (/0., 0., +z_plasma / 2./) + plasma_centre
00042         case(3) ! x-z-plane, negative y
00043             normal_vector = (/0., +1., 0./)
00044             offset_vector = (/0., -y_plasma / 2., 0./) + plasma_centre
00045         case(4) ! x-z-plane, positive y
00046             normal_vector = (/0., -1., 0./)
00047             offset_vector = (/0., +y_plasma / 2., 0./) + plasma_centre
00048         case(5) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00049             normal_vector = (/+1., 0., 0./)
00050             offset_vector = (/-x_plasma / 2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00051         case(6) ! y-z-plane, positive x
00052             normal_vector = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00053             offset_vector = (/+x_plasma / 2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00054         end select
00055 
00056         c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00057     case(1) ! sphere
00058         r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00059         c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00060     case(2) ! disc
00061         select case (face_nr)
00062         case(1) ! the tube in x-direction
00063             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00064             c_status = r_diff(2)**2 + r_diff(3)**2 - r_sphere**2
00065         case(2) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00066             normal_vector = (/+1., 0., 0./)
00067             offset_vector = (/-x_plasma / 2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00068             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00069         case(3) ! y-z-plane, positive x
00070             normal_vector = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00071             offset_vector = (/+x_plasma / 2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00072             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00073         end select
00074     case(3)  ! wire
00075         select case (face_nr)
00076         case(1) ! the tube in z-direction
00077             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00078             c_status = r_diff(1)**2 + r_diff(2)**2 - r_sphere**2
00079         case(2) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00080             normal_vector = (/0., 0., +1./)
00081             offset_vector = (/0., 0., -z_plasma / 2./) + plasma_centre
00082             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00083         case(3) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00084             normal_vector = (/0., 0., -1./)
00085             offset_vector = (/0., 0., +z_plasma / 2./) + plasma_centre
00086             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00087         end select
00088     case (4) ! ellipsoid
00089         A = reshape((/1 / x_plasma, 0., 0., 0., 1 / y_plasma, 0., 0., 0., 1 / z_plasma/), (/3, 3/))
00090         r_diff = matmul(A, r - plasma_centre)
00091         c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00092     case (5) ! prism in x-y plane
00093         gamma = atan(y_plasma / (2 * x_plasma))
00094         select case (face_nr)
00095         case(1) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00096             normal_vector = (/0., 0., -1./)
00097             offset_vector = (/0., 0., +z_plasma / 2./) + plasma_centre
00098         case(2) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00099             normal_vector = (/0., 0., +1./)
00100             offset_vector = (/0., 0., -z_plasma / 2./) + plasma_centre
00101         case(3) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00102             normal_vector = (/+1., 0., 0./)
00103             offset_vector = (/-x_plasma / 2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00104         case(4) ! negative y
00105             normal_vector = (/-sin(gamma), +cos(gamma), 0./)
00106             offset_vector = (/-x_plasma / 2., -y_plasma / 2., 0./) + plasma_centre
00107         case(5) ! positive y
00108             normal_vector = (/-sin(gamma), -cos(gamma), 0./)
00109             offset_vector = (/-x_plasma / 2., +y_plasma / 2.,0./) + plasma_centre
00110         end select
00111         c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00112     case (6) ! semisphere
00113         select case (face_nr)
00114         case(1) ! semisphere
00115             r_diff = r + (/r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./) - plasma_centre
00116             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00117         case(2) ! y-z-plane
00118             normal_vector = (/+1., 0., 0./)
00119             offset_vector = (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00120             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00121         end select
00122     case (7) ! hollow sphere
00123         r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00124         select case (face_nr)
00125         case(1) ! outer_sphere
00126             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00127         case(2) ! inner_sphere
00128             c_status = (r_sphere - x_plasma)**2 - dot_product(r_diff, r_diff)
00129         end select
00130     case (8) ! hollow semisphere
00131         select case (face_nr)
00132         case(1) ! outer semisphere
00133             r_diff = r + (/r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) - plasma_centre
00134             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00135         case(2) ! inner semisphere
00136             r_diff = r + (/r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) - plasma_centre
00137             c_status = (r_sphere - x_plasma)**2 - dot_product(r_diff, r_diff)
00138         case(3) ! y-z-plane
00139             normal_vector = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00140             offset_vector = (/r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00141             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00142         end select
00143     end select
00144 
00145 end subroutine face
